name: Camp Crimson
description:
Everyone wonders how he can win time and time again. Perhaps the answer is far more sinister than anyone expected. You know the truth, and you have to put a stop to it. Travel to the camp deep in the forest. Find all seven of his rings, and make it back to your truck to escape, if you can. 

I made this project so I could learn more about game development as well as get experience in the field. Some of the images, animations, sounds, and meshes are not mine. I used sources such as Maximo and The Models Resource for such assets.
